column2: "Israel n’abakan Reuben n’asefo
column4: naaso susuampa dɛ oguu n’egya ne mpa ho fi ntsi
column5: wɔdze n’abakan ndzinoa maa Israel ne ba Josef ne mba no; na ebusuasantsen nkanee no so woemmbu ano wɔ abakan ndzinoa no do.)"

column2: "Ɔwɔ mu dɛ Juda dzii no nuanom do nyim
column3: na ɔbapɔmba no fii no mu bae; naaso abakan ndzinoa no dze ɔyɛɛ Josef dze."

column2: "Israel n’abakan Reuben ne mba nye; Hanok
"Joel ne n’asefo nye; Semaia
"Mika
"na Beera a Asiriahen Tilgat-pilneser faa no ndɔmmum kɔree no: ɔno nye Reubenfo mu bapɔmba."
"Na no nuanom dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee
column3: wɔ aber a worubu hɔn ebusuasantsen nkanee ano no nye yi; otsitsir Jeiel
column8: Joel ne ba no a ɔtsenaa Aroer araa dze kodur Nebo na Baal-meon ho:"

column2: "na boka afamu so ɔtsenae araa dze kodur sar no n’ahɛnee a ofi esutsen Eufrates ho: osiandɛ hɔn mbowakuw dɔree wɔ Gilead asaase do."
"Na Saul ne nda no mu no ɔnye Hagrifo dzii ako
column3: ma wɔtotɔr hɔn nsaano: na wɔtsenatsenaa hɔn asesee mu wɔ Gilead boka afamu asaase no do nyinara."

column2: "Na Gadmba no tsenaa hɔn tsentsendo
column3: wɔ Bashan asaase do dze kodur Saleka:"

column2: "Joel dzi kan
"na hɔn nuanom a wofi hɔn egyanom efiefi nye yi; Maekɛl
"Woyinom nye Abihail ne mba. Abihail n’ebusuasantsen nye
"Ahi
column3: a ɔyɛ Abdiel a n’egya nye Guni ne ba no
column4: yɛ otsitsir wɔ hɔn egyanom efiefi do."

column2: "Na wɔtsenaa Gilead wɔ Bashan
column4: na Saron no nkurotsia nyinara araa dze kodur hɔn ahe do."

column2: "Iyinom nyinara wobuu ano ebusuasantsen nkanee no wɔ Judahen Jotam ne nda no mu
column3: na Israelhen Jeroboam ne nda no mu."

column2: "Reuben ne mba
column6: mbarimba a wokitsa kyɛm na afona
column9: wɔyɛ nyimpa mpem eduanan anan ahaesuon eduosia a wotum dɛ wotu kɔ ɔsa."

column2: "Na wɔnye Hagrifo
"Na wɔboaa hɔn ma wɔfaa hɔn do
column4: na hɔn a wɔka hɔn ho no nyinara
column5: hyɛɛ hɔn nsa: osiandɛ wɔtseaa mu frɛɛ Nyankopɔn wɔ ɔko no mu
column6: na otsiee hɔn; osiandɛ wɔdze hɔn werɛ tweer no."

column2: "Na wɔfaa hɔn mbowakuw kɔree; hɔn efumpɔnkɔ mu mpemeduonum
"Na piigyan hwee ase totɔree
column3: osiandɛ ɔsa no fi Nyankopɔn hɔ. Na wɔfaa hɔn nkurow no tsenatsenaa mu kodur ndɔmmumkɔ no mu."

column2: "Na Manaasɛ ebusuakuw fa no mba no tsenaa asaase no do: na wɔdɔree fi Bashan dze kodur Baal-hermon na Senir na bepɔw Hermon ho."
"Na woyinom nye hɔn egyanom efiefi do etsitsir; mekyerɛ Efer
column10: nyimpa a wɔwɔ dzin. Wɔyɛ hɔn egyanom efiefi do etsitsir."

column2: "Naaso wɔfoom hɔn egyanom Nyankopɔn
column4: dɛ wokedzii asaase no do aman a Nyankopɔn sɛɛ hɔn wɔ hɔn enyim no enyame ekyir."

column2: "Na Israel Nyankopɔn no nunuu Asiria ahemfo Pul
